lenientdeath.command.trinketsSafe.disabl: Trinkets are no longer kept automatically.
Lenient Death is enabled for you.
Lenient Death is disabled for you.
Lenient Death is now enabled for you.
Lenient Death is now disabled for you.
lenientdeath.command.trinketsSafe.notLoa: Note: Mod Trinkets is not loaded.
lenientdeath.command.generate.success2: Place in your world's 'datapacks' folder, use /datapack enable "file/lenientdeath" and /reload the world/server.
lenientdeath.command.generate.error: Error generating datapack; check the console for details.
lenientdeath.command.listErroredTags: Tags which have failed to load at some point (use '/ld erroredTags reset' to clear):
text.autoconfig.lenientdeath.title: LenientDeath Config
text.autoconfig.lenientdeath.option.dete: Whether to detect item eligibility automatically using the same rules as /ld generate, in addition to the rules below. False means only using the rules below.
text.autoconfig.lenientdeath.option.trin: Whether to keep all trinkets upon death (if Trinkets is loaded) - you can still enable this for individual trinkets if false.
text.autoconfig.lenientdeath.option.item: List of item IDs to keep upon death.
text.autoconfig.lenientdeath.option.tags: List of item tags to keep upon death.
An updated version can be made using /ld generate.
